Title: Wearable high-density diffuse optical tomography (HD-DOT) for unrestricted 3D functional neuroimaging
Abstract: © 2020 The Author(s).We introduce a new wearable HD-DOT system that allows neuroimaging in naturalistic environments. Test results with visual paradigms show comparable performance to larger fiber-based systems, while extra-laboratory recordings demonstrate the feasibility of unrestricted brain imaging.
